___traits_trait_additional_properties_js.description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.
___traits_trait_additional_properties_js.title: Has additional properties

___traits_trait_canonical_url_json.description: The relative URL to this document on the website specified by the `canonical_website` field. In the Arc ecosystem, this will be populated by the content api from the arc-canonical-url service if present based on the canonical_website. In conjunction with canonical_website, it can be used to determine the SEO canonical url or open graph url. In a multi-site context, this field may be different from the website_url field.
___traits_trait_canonical_url_json.title: Canonical URL

___traits_trait_headlines_json.description: The headline(s) or title for this content.  The 'basic' key is required.
___traits_trait_headlines_json.title: Headlines

___traits_trait_id_json.description: A globally unique identifier of the content in the ANS repository.
___traits_trait_id_json.title: Globally Unique ID trait

___traits_trait_last_updated_date_json.description: When the content was last updated (RFC3339-formatted).
___traits_trait_last_updated_date_json.title: Last Updated Date

___traits_trait_revision_json.description: Trait that applies revision information to a document. In the Arc ecosystem, many of these fields are populated in stories by the Story API.

branch.description: The name of the branch this revision was created on.

editions.description: A list of identifiers of editions that point to this revision.

parent_id.description: The unique id of the revision that this revisions was branched from, or preceded it on the current branch.

published.description: Whether or not this revision's parent story is published, in any form or place

revision_id.description: The unique id of this revision.

user_id.description: The unique user id of the person who created this revision.

___traits_trait_revision_json.title: Revision
